question: How do I purchase a course?
answer: To purchase your course online just follow the link. Online purchases can either be paid for immediately by credit/debit card, you can nominate somebody else to pay on your behalf, or an invoice can be requested. TechSync+ Members login using their existing membership number and password. Non TechSync+ Members must register their details first.

question: Do I have to complete a course in one go?
answer: No, you can visit it at anytime, wherever you are. Each course is made up of a number of individual modules which enables you to complete it in your own time and at times convenient to you. If you wish to return to the course at the point you last left it at, please ensure you use the same device to access the course and do not clear your cache in between visits.

question: How long do I have access to my purchased course?
answer: You have access to the courses you have purchased indefinitely.  Access to the assessment will be for a 12-month period from the date of purchase.

question: Is my purchased course transferable?
answer: No. Your course cannot be transferred to anyone else.

question: What if I forget my login details?
answer: f you forget your TechSync+ login details please go to the TechSync+ website and click on 'My Account', My Details then change password.
